3.title: My Fair Matey
3.author: story and illustration by Jaime ; edited by L
notes: "19th century life can be challenging for dirty, unrefined, orphan dealing, former transgender pirates. It's no wonder then that Florian Smelton is trying to make a career change and improve his lot in life. A fateful encounter with a wealthy young heiress sets the stage for both progress and peril in a tale only Jaime's pen could tell"

155.title: My Grandparents are Secret Agents
155.author: created and written by Scott Christian Sava ; with art by Juan Saavedra Mourgues and Invasor Creative Art Studio.
notes: Summary (from OCLC): Did you ever wonder why grandparents travel so much? Why they always need the latest devices like hearing aids and pace makers? Why they always seem to "forget" the past? It's because they're really secret agents employed by social security. You may not know it, but your grandparents could be out saving the world from evil
